alert.note: Alert for Concho; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 6:33PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN COLEMAN... NORTHWESTERN MCCULLOCH...SOUTHEASTERN RUNNELS AND NORTHERN CONCHO COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM CST... At 632 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Us-83 Near The Concho- Runnels County Line, or near Paint Rock, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Paint Rock, Stacy, Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina, Voss, Leaday, Doole, Millersview, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929, and Us-83 Near The Concho- Runnels County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
